name: Potater
description:
GO GET POTATOES!!!!

Your father is mad and wants you to go pick up potatoes because you sadly have none. Go finish your task!

Can you collect all 60 potatoes in just 60 seconds?

This monstrosity was made for Trijam, the 3 Hour Game Jam.

The art for this game's menu & the background for the gameplay was all made by my brother :D
